<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60>Score more with Trick Shots!</size></outline>




<size=56>Use a ball to pocket another ball




Pocket more than one ball




Pocket a ball using a rail
</size>

<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60>Pocket balls to score points.</size></outline>

<size=48><color=#2d222d>Shot Sunk points = 
Ball Number * Pocket Multiplier

Example: 9-ball in "x10" Pocket = 90 pts</c></size>






<size=50>Heart will change to score 
if the game complete successful.

Failure to pocket will lose heart. </size>

<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60></size></outline>

<size=48><color=#2d222d>The game is completed and no lost heart.</c></size>


<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=50>You have a limited time and 
will get bonus for early finish.</size></outline>


<size=50>Time bonus calculation:</size>

<size=60><color=#404d84>
Shots Total                            
Trick Shots                           
Time Bonus                           
</c></size>

<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60>Let's take a monent to learn
the controls before beginning.</size></outline>
<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60>Drag your finger to move the cue.</size></outline>
<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60>Drag the power meter and release to shoot.</size></outline>
<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60>Slider up and down to fine-tune the angle.</size></outline>

<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60>Score more points with trick shots.
Use the 9 ball to pocket the 12 ball.</size></outline>

<outline color=#272730 width=3><size=60>You've mastered the basics.
Let's go to practice game to
learn the rest.</size></outline>
Pocket a ball using a rail
